content.description:
Man; what to say...just watch the vid 

  Video:  

dpmclimbing.com/climbing-vi…
content.location: In between 45 portion of Bunker Boulder and highball. Possibly in between climb 17 and 18 on pg. 10 of Guidebook: docs.google.com/fileview?id…

content.description:
Second rung to becoming a Parking Lot Pro. People come from all over for this guy. 

  Guidebook, pg. 8: docs.google.com/viewer?a=v&…

  First climb on this video: 

youtube.com/watch?v=Mj_nrMF…
content.location: South side of 45 Boulder, center/right side. Right hand tooth shaped gaston, left hand razor crimp. Go up and right to jug top out.

content.description: Crux is either the start (pinchy/crimpy) or the top out (mantle). The is the first rung on the ladder to becoming a Yonah Parking Lot Boulder pro.
content.location:
Located approximately in the center of the Parking Lot Boulders on the south side of the 45/Bunker Boulder, extreme right side. Sit start on lowest holds with right foot on slopey shelf. Throw left, then right. Move left and get left foot on the shelf. Get over the edge somehow (multiple ways). 

  Guidebook, pg. 8: docs.google.com/fileview?id…

content.description:
Crux is working your way up the triangle. All holds after this have a lot of foot support under them. Start with hands on outside left and right points of triangle. Work hands inward and right hand to upper point of triangle. Throw left to lip jug, then right to chicken head. Reach over to left hand jug. Heel hooking and topping out to the left are both off.  

  Video: youtube.com/watch?v=6TxGy0D…
content.location: Center of 45 Boulder. Can't miss the triangle pointing up.

content.description:
Start on two crimps, throw to jug, then go right using holds under lip. Top out right, just left of tree on top of boulder. The chickenhead is off. 

  Climb is at 2:00 of video: 

vimeo.com/32822602
content.location:
Crimps on left side of 45 boulder. 

  Guidebook pgs. 8-9: docs.google.com/viewer?a=v&…

content.description:
Climb located on Parking Lot highball. Bring your A game. 

  Video: 

youtube.com/watch?v=FeRnq2V…
content.protection: Pad and spotter (possibly an EMT standing by)
content.location:
Find the biggest boulder in the area and jump start from the large rock to the jug rail that runs up and right. 

  Guidebook pg. 10: docs.google.com/viewer?a=v&…

content.description:
You are pretty much a Parking Lot Hoss if you can do this one.  

  Video: youtube.com/watch?v=mhblUyw…
content.location: Just right of center on south side of 45 Boulder. Sit start version of Yonah Man. Start low on sloped ledge. Go up and top out on Yonah Man.

content.description: Start matched on the crescent shaped right-facing sidepull and traverse up the lip topping out at the apex of the boulder
content.location: Leftmost hold on the lip of the 45 boulder cave

content.description: Sit start right hand high side-pull, left hand undercling/pinch, move up and top out on 'The Golden Road'Not sure if this has been done before, but it definitely adds a little spice.

Stand start on right facing side pull. Go up on big ledge and straight up to top out. 

  Pgs 10-11 of guidebook: docs.google.com/fileview?id…

  First climb of video: 

youtube.com/watch?v=gx1iuoE…
content.location: walk to the left and past sparrow. this climb to the left of the massive overhang.

content.description:
start on arete and climb straight up slightly right of arete. topout 

  Guidebook pgs 10-11: docs.google.com/fileview?id…
content.location: walk past sparrow to the left. huge highball boulder.
